title: What are 7 words that ruin everything and destroy success? - Quora

response.answer_text: The 7 words that ruined and destroyed everything was my thought Before starting anything no matter what I would over think it and make my thoughts reach that high so that i dont have to work for it to become successful Cause I am already successful in my thoughts These thoughts pull me back from succeeding Even if I started working for it and if its not upto our thought , then you would be draged back. Cause the thoughts you made weren't realistic and thus if you fail in going with the thought that could do some effect on your on going process But here is how your thought can make you succeed Make your thoughts even more realistic towards you In that way you can outrun your own thought And that would be the best Nd most satisfying feeling Thats why we say If you think of the extreme situation in the things you do, then whatever happen you would be cool
Jealousy 2: Comparison  3:Procrastination  4:Not Today  5:Overthinking  6:Overconfidence  7;And most important: Pride  Thank you
